phrases.89fa2d2b2f0870f3991482370df5e10e: Beautiful flow. Time to balance with your left side.
phrases.832fbebbed6fe1f8eb3d01fe19f66912: Beautiful. Now let's transition to the other side.
phrases.f6b9767362612010c84c3e36d693f95b: Bend both knees and turn your feet to point outward. Lower your hips and bring your torso upright into Goddess.

phrases.17f2740de4f7a7b8416e63f3c34ff2e7: Bend your front knee over your ankle
phrases.b603796663e6e8c967e0675a73e1b0a7: Bend your front knee slightly and shift your weight forward. Lift your back leg as you bring your bottom hand to the mat for Half Moon.

phrases.bed4ae95ce31c08ef195ba9334963877: Keep your arms straight and head between your biceps

phrases.7b82bec357be91517b889b8e3bd733ed: Kick your foot into your hand while leaning forward

phrases.dff328727a40d0a50480a30c9baa1e6a: Let's start our practice with Downward Dog.
phrases.c74806cd4bd53be5ed7cd01758c5322e: Let's start our practice with Goddess.
phrases.bc73d4f0020640ea7239997af82a9564: Let's start our practice with Half Moon.
phrases.a0edc618542f662b7f21d680ad410430: Let's start our practice with Tree.
phrases.718e58e3c63bbd46e685c2ae7a8e553e: Let's start our practice with Triangle.
phrases.1629eda83efe0cb4243e42123a969895: Let's start our practice with Warrior.
phrases.c8508fc4837fa52cf1533af2096569d3: Lift your hips up and back
phrases.ebe8d0e7ea1c2cfea09adc35892b8ea1: Listen to your body and move with intention.
phrases.ebe05f0a36fba4f6627462333efda50e: Lovely. Let's balance that out on the other side.
phrases.6366054e7e6aed9b7e8deb18597b61df: Lower your lifted leg and bring both hands to the mat. Step back and lift your hips into Downward Dog.
phrases.81f6c620e6ec4587b738999a5f9f04c7: Lower your lifted leg and pivot to face the opposite direction. Shift your weight and lift your other leg into Half Moon.
phrases.addf793d5d4ba0eaf5e397a62c33fd25: Lower your lifted leg to the ground behind you. Keep both legs straight as you open into Triangle.
phrases.d08d1a2b79ca12fcfccaec600c701610: Lower your raised foot slightly and catch your ankle with your hand. Press your foot into your palm as you hinge forward into Dancer.
phrases.7e91c6f6bde5ca596899e9159affdd26: Lower your raised foot to the ground behind you, stepping back into a lunge. Bend your front knee and sink your hips into Warrior.
phrases.b5c8cef4ee54965cea87913309fd0cfb: Lower your raised foot wide to the side, turning your toes outward. Bend both knees deeply and sink your hips into Goddess pose.
phrases.a013544b0dbe8b8235ee72720a6c5a7d: Lower your raised foot wide to the side. Straighten both legs, extend your arms, and reach toward one foot as you fold into Triangle.
phrases.af529bcd8b897d21a9655d236d8a633e: Match each movement to your breath.
phrases.b878cf9ccdbf6563307b80e9e4b9c483: Mindfully transition to the next pose.
phrases.2d38216ab94e1f1156b2f0ef958a67c9: Namaste. Thank you for practicing today. You've done beautifully.

phrases.1113f65272efa308fa404bc8eecc1bad: Never place your foot on your knee
phrases.7e6df6cac1c35eccf5e1e9c8885cfe61: Notice where you can adjust to get closer to the target.
phrases.85f674ac270a850d780e80c8b7da8890: Now the same on your right.
phrases.a91221f06919e3070f7cbb9a5e6669f9: Now, let's mirror that on your right side.
phrases.bc0b085f98e4aa7fd6852a884889a108: Our next pose is Downward Dog.
phrases.ff66f03ec2c6c6fb51e7f54ba946354c: Our next pose is Half Moon.
phrases.a73c15d7041c157b76c4814598bea87f: Our opening pose is Downward Dog.
phrases.be0709341617e2686d1efa3ed2aaa918: Our opening pose is Half Moon.
phrases.9b3a45df77889caeb43f3da1a42fea6d: Pivot on your feet, turning to face one direction. Extend your back leg straight as you sink into a Warrior lunge.
phrases.db57f5956ecfbc29b52ef7bc8a276747: Place your hands on the mat framing your front foot. Step your front foot back to meet the other, lifting your hips high into Downward Dog.
phrases.434fcdf03a9bab500f52938d2711848a: Place your other foot on your inner thigh or calf
phrases.863087feb270cd61ec7eefaa57b44dd2: Press your heels toward the floor

phrases.4472d529de1ebeac57a724f514636dfe: Reach toward that foot while keeping both legs straight
phrases.ae15d810bf527bfccd0f1f88ec81bca1: Release your back foot and fold forward, bringing your hands to the mat. Step back into Downward Dog.
phrases.7d9c7963605adc0747e8cc1112a2b741: Release your feet and come onto your hands and knees. Tuck your toes and lift your hips into Downward Dog.
phrases.435256a6cd596b4e96888784305a820d: Release your foot and extend your leg straight behind you. Lower your torso and reach toward the ground for Half Moon.
phrases.16b50907621350c9ac20a9a9e6dc7cb7: Release your foot and stand tall. Shift your weight to your other leg, reach back for your opposite ankle, and flow into Dancer.
phrases.15189da47b346b6fc9e2e4ffa395ceab: Release your foot and step it back behind you into a lunge. Sink your hips into Warrior.
phrases.b944e4a7e777a0f268669fd85104ed56: Rest here as long as you need. Thank you for your practice.
phrases.0a7ebdd8b58e8de776ae538ab4841685: Right side complete. Let's bring that same energy to your left.
phrases.cfe00a6e562781648d48ad9227bc0948: Rise to standing, keeping your feet wide and toes turned out. Bend your knees and sink into Goddess.
phrases.a506188891980e381510ba0198a6bfed: Rise up and pivot your feet to face the opposite direction. Extend your arms and fold toward your other leg.
phrases.39d3bc77719424de03d596e4426b4cbb: Shift your weight onto your front foot and place your front hand on the mat. Lift your back leg parallel to the ground and open your chest to the side.
phrases.414912efca126e3a2e0fa5e30d30c844: Shift your weight to one leg and bring your feet together. Lift your other foot to your inner thigh as you rise into Tree.
phrases.aa6dd8965bb56c0b7b767016e3d4b977: Sit with the soles of your feet together
phrases.7c56d76185d057ef708585f020b42ede: Slowly lower your foot to the ground. Shift your weight to your other leg and lift your opposite foot to your inner thigh.
phrases.15ffb766b3b31ec873ad3d9419493315: Slowly lower your lifted leg behind you into a lunge. Lift your torso upright and settle into Warrior pose.
phrases.e7a4fcb7ae008d9bc716eb83fe41ed7a: Small adjustments make a big difference.
phrases.c2416347f532bdb2d948aa65f879ccb7: Softly correct your form when you're ready.
phrases.736eab355cd85d03e30600ec912529f3: Stand on one leg with the other extended behind you
phrases.28bcb9e9bd5c51a9096e07f0f91f645b: Stand with feet wide, toes pointed outward
phrases.3be0615a6a1e63089e303425ed872887: Stay low in your squat as you shift your weight. Goddess is symmetric, so simply re-center your stance.
phrases.364c467fad62ecf0a28995d71953b00f: Step one foot back into a lunge
phrases.08f2b0b2c10d785ff0266f50a4ae6018: Step your back foot forward and find your balance on your front leg. Reach back with one hand to grab your opposite ankle, then hinge forward.
phrases.ca60532103f833c08680e31b20dd4d4e: Step your back foot forward to meet your front foot. Ground through your standing leg, then slowly lift your other foot to rest on your inner thigh.
phrases.66ce47626da7cbe5d74fbed52851401a: Step your feet together and pause. Now step your other foot forward, bending into Warrior on the opposite side.
phrases.f5a033aff6054aadaf7640b9eafcb04d: Step your foot forward and rise to standing with feet wide. Turn your front foot out, extend your arms, and fold sideways into Triangle.
phrases.2857a9407d33d06e38aca6fb3a8e0c67: Step your right foot forward between your hands. Ground your back heel and rise up, bending your front knee into Warrior.
phrases.0a2d7d52d067aaddbc97eb7098874d60: Straighten one leg while keeping the other bent. Extend your arms wide and reach toward your straight leg into Triangle.
phrases.4d53976850c9fdc64c12937f71a6c2e6: Straighten your front leg and open your hips to the side. Extend your arms wide, then reach toward your front foot as you come into Triangle.
phrases.532f5f0c1ed71b53545fdb6f6b5d1b37: Take a moment to center yourself. When you're ready, we'll start together.
phrases.281ab936a4a4d74ccad5e25f244524c9: Take a moment to realign with the target pose.
phrases.dcf65f70ba19211d717efd933af886c1: Take your time coming back. You've given yourself a beautiful gift today.

phrases.c2c65e6fc3e648a9ca304d842a02de94: Turn your back foot out and pivot to face forward. Widen your stance, bend both knees deeply, and sink into Goddess pose.
phrases.39f013f2b8fd72a3d94204533a2c8f4b: Uncross your legs and rise to standing. Ground through one foot and lift the other to your inner thigh.
phrases.c1d9c9a49994b05fc71c68be0ed44110: Walk your feet toward your hands and rise to standing. Step your feet wide, turn your toes out, and sink into Goddess pose.
phrases.bc10462bdcf5d6027b5b3e48aeeba1f1: Walk your feet toward your hands and slowly roll up to standing. Shift your weight to one leg and lift the other foot to your inner thigh.
